content: using size us 2 5 16 3 mm 40 cm circular needle us e4 3 5 mm crochet hook and mc yarn co 108 112 116 120 sts plus one additional st for joining in the round 109 113 117 121 sts distribute sts evenly on the needle being careful not to twist sts slip first st to the left needle take last st pass it over the first and drop it from the needle pull on the working yarn to tighten the joint return first st back to the right needle 108 112 116 120 sts place marker for bor slip marker throughout round 1 k 2 p 2 to end repeat last round 14 14 16 16 more times or until ribbing measures 1 4 1 4 1 6 1 6 or 3 5 3 5 4 4 cm body round 1 change to us 6 16 4mm 40 cm needle and knit to end round 2 for sizes s and m k 25 26 k2tog 4 times total 104 108 sts for sizes l and xl knit to end round 3 4 knit to end colorwork pattern begin colorwork pattern attaching cc yarn for rounds 5-47 below you can use the chart on last page or follow the written instructions round 5 k 1 mc k 1 cc k 2 mc to end round 6 k mc to end round 7 k 3 mc k 1 cc to end round 8 k 1 mc k 1 cc k 2 mc to end round 9 k 3 mc k 1 cc to end round 10 k 1 cc k 1 mc to end round 11 k 1 mc k 1 cc to end round 12 k 3 cc k 1 mc to end round 13-17 k cc to end round 18 k 3 cc k 1 mc to end round 19 k 1 mc k 1 cc to end round 20 k 1 cc k 1 mc to end round 21 k 3 mc k 1 cc to end round 22 k 1 mc k 1 cc k 2 mc to end round 23 k 3 mc k 1 cc to end round 24 k mc to end round 25 k 1 mc k 1 cc k 2 mc to end round 26 k mc to end round 27 k 3 mc k 1 cc to end round 28 k mc to end round 29 k 1 mc k 1 cc k 2 mc to end round 30 k 3 mc k 1 cc to end round 31 k 1 mc k 1 cc k 2 mc to end round 32 k 1 cc k 1 mc to end round 33 k1 mc k 1 cc to end round 34 k 1 cc k 1 mc k 2 cc to end round 35-39 k cc to end round 40 k 1 cc k 1 mc k 2 cc to end round 41 k 1 mc k 1 cc
